name: webextension-toolbox
description: Framework for WebExtensions (Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Edge)
author: Henrik Wenz <HaNdTriX@gmail.com> (https://github.com/HaNdTriX)

scripts.link: npm link && cd examples/bookmark-it && npm link webextension-toolbox
scripts.test: npm run link && npm run test:standard && npm run test:config
scripts.test:standard: cd examples/bookmark-it && npm run build chrome && npm run build firefox && npm run build opera && npm run build edge && npm run build firefox -m
scripts.test:config: cd examples/bookmark-it && npm run build:config chrome && npm run build:config firefox && npm run build:config opera && npm run build:config edge && npm run build:config firefox -m
